title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Thursday, 31 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: ukip leader nigel farage has told an audience in thurrock the european union has allowed the free movement of terrorists .
a 15-year-old boy arrested on sus of murdering a father of two in harlow has been released on bail .
southend united gave their fading league one play-off hopes a boost with a home victory over sheffield united .
more news , sport , travel and weather updates from 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's it from us at essex live today - thanks for joining us .
we 'll be back in the morning from 08:00 with the latest news , sport , weather and travel for the county .
have a great evening .

documents.title: essex and herts air ambulance buys new £ 6m helicopter
text: a milestone has been reached for the essex and herts air ambulance as for the first time it has raised enough money to buy its very own helicopter .
the £ 6m agusta westland will be operational from july 2017 when the lease for its current aircraft runs out .
rob forsyth , chair of the trust , called the purchase `` magnificent '' and thanked members of the public for their continued donations .

documents.title: van artist thinks essex 'van ' gogh artwork 'looks cool '
text: remember the 'van ' gogh story we told you about earlier ?
we 've had no luck tracing the artist who drew the .
using the dirt of a vehicle - but we have spoke to a man who has done something similar .
ruddy muddy from norfolk is a `` van artist '' and is responsible for the above .
he says he loves making the artwork because `` it 's so much nicer than seeing a rude comment '' .
when asked what he thought about the essex 'van ' gogh 's work , he said it : `` looks cool '' .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: weather : dry and clear overnight with frost
text: any isolated showers will soon die out this evening to leave a dry and clear night across all parts .
these clear skies , coupled with light winds , will allow a fairly widespread frost to develop .
minimum temperature : 0c ( 32f ) .
after a chilly start tomorrow , a fine , albeit increasingly breezy day will follow with light winds and plenty of sunshine .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: headlines : weeley crash woman remains 'critical ' southend play-off ambitions 'realistic '
text: here are the top stories from essex this afternoon :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: essex police counters closing to the public tomorrow
text: south ockendon , brentwood , loughton , epping , rayleigh and canvey police stations are closing their doors to the public tomorrow .
in total , 15 of the county 's front desks are shutting in a bid to reduce the money spent on essex police buildings that are n't well-used by residents .
stations in grays , basildon , harlow , chelmsford , braintree , colchester , clacton and maldon are due to remain open to the public .

documents.title: phil brown : southend play-off chances 'simple mathematics '
text: southend united manager phil brown insists the shrimpers ' play-off ambitions are realistic with seven league games remaining .
after last night 's win over sheffield united , brown 's side are just six points outside the top six .
`` if we carry on like this , with seven games to go we might get enough points to get into the play-offs , '' the 56-year-old told bbc essex .
`` it 's not rocket science , '' he continued .
`` it 's simple mathematics . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: southend hospital only had enough staff and beds for 155 days last year
text: southend hospital did not have enough staff , beds or capacity for new patients for more than half of last year .
author: Southend Echo

documents.title: your clouds loom 'ominously ' over clacton pier
text: thanks to alan conran who emailed this a short while ago .
he said : `` view towards clacton pier this afternoon as dark cloud looms over ominously ``
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a12 closed chelmsford-bound between j14 and j15
text: the a12 is closed chelmsford-bound between j14 and j15 for ingatestone due to an accident .
essex police officer colin shead says emergency services are on the scene .
# a12 closed j14 > j15 ingatestone > margaretting due to rtc .
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid on scene .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: tributes to tragic benefits by the sea star gaz barnes after he loses battle against booze
text: tributes have been paid to an alcoholic whose battle against the booze was charted on tv reality show jaywick : benefits by the sea .
author: Daily Gazette

documents.title: video showing a taxi driver being fined in essex goes viral online
text: have you seen this video ?

it shows a taxi driver being given a parking ticket for dropping off an elderly passenger on double yellow lines in chelmsford and it 's sparked much debate as to whether he was doing a good thing or blatantly breaking the law .
the footage , which sees the passenger give the traffic warden a ticking-off , has been viewed more than 100,000 times online since the incident happened on tuesday .
chelmsford city council said the warden had `` no choice '' but to issue a ticket as that was `` the requirement of his job '' .
but dan robinson , owner of the chauffeur company whose driver was caught , told bbc essex he was `` furious '' at the fine .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: your sunny start in clacton this morning
text: it was a glorious start in essex this morning , as captured by bbc weather watcher `` royboy '' who sent us this photo from clacton-on-sea .
we love seeing your photos from around essex .
if you 'd like to share them , you can send us an email , a tweet or visit us on facebook .
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: weather : sunny spells and light winds , some showers possible later
text: it will be a mainly dry and fine afternoon with light winds and some good sunny spells .
however , one or two showers may well develop , and they could be heavy with thunder .
maximum temperature : 12c ( 54f ) .
get the latest weather updates for essex here .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: headlines : second man dies in weeley crash stansted airport increases drop-off price to £ 3 for 10 minutes
text: here are the top stories in essex this lunchtime :
author: Nick Alliker
BBC Essex

documents.title: stansted airport drop-off price increase 'disheartening '
text: bosses at stansted airport are defending their decision to increase the terminal 's drop-off charges to £ 3 for 10 minutes as of tomorrow .
we 've been hearing from many listeners who are n't happy .
it 's really disheartening that they 've taken this approach to maximum their revenues ''
if you 're a regular user of stansted airport - we 'd love to hear what you think about this story .
you can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: BBC Essex

documents.title: lord sugar one of many paying tribute to ronnie corbett
text: you may have heard the sad news announced a short while ago that ronnie corbett has died aged 85 .

many famous faces have taken to social media to pay their respects to the entertainer , including essex entrepreneur lord sugar , who tweeted : `` sad news about ronnie corbett , very funny man r.i.p '' .
a special live page has been set up with reaction to the star 's death .
you can view that here .

text: it seems this is n't the first time the 'van ' gogh of essex ( as we 're now calling the artist ) has struck in essex
dan gleeballs tweeted this photo he took on the a12 last week .
do you know who 's doing the artwork ?
drop us an email , a tweet or visit our facebook page .

documents.title: second man dies in weeley road crash
text: a second man has died following a crash on the a133 in weeley on monday , police say .
a 74-year-old from brandon in suffolk died at addenbrooke 's hospital in cambridge yesterday .
he was the driver of a kia sedona which crashed with a red ford focus .
another man , 70 , from clacton , was pronounced dead at the scene .
a 65-year-old woman remains in a critical , but stable condition in hospital in colchester .

documents.title: stansted airport puts up drop-off price to £ 3 for 10 minutes
text: from tomorrow there will be an increase in the amount you pay to use the drop-off zone at stansted airport .
the north essex terminal is increasing the charge for a 10 minute stay from £ 2.50 to £ 3 .
a £ 50 fine is also being introduced for anybody who exceeds their time .
bosses say the drop-off is a `` premium service '' which people do not have to use , and the airport is trying to reduce congestion there .

documents.title: 'van ' gogh ? dirty vehicle artwork spotted in chelmsford
text: you would n't be washing this off in a hurry , would you ?
this dirty artwork was spotted on a van in essex yeomanry way in chelmsford this morning .
james , a passenger in a nearby vehicle , tweeted : `` some people see dirt , others see art !
do you know who this van belongs to ?
get in touch via email or twitter .
some people see dirt , others see art !

documents.title: victory gives southend united 's play-off hopes a boost
text: southend united gave their fading league one play-off hopes a boost with a home victory over sheffield united last night .
tyrone barnett , david worrall ( jack payne all scored to secure the blues a 3-1 win .
they 're now eighth in the table , six points adrift of the play-off places .
worrall told bbc essex : `` we 've still got a chance but we need to be realistic '' .
author: Ben Fryer
BBC Essex Sport

documents.title: nigel farage : the european union has allowed the 'free movement of terrorists '
text: ukip leader nigel farage has told an audience of about 500 people in thurrock the european union has allowed the `` free movement of terrorists '' .
he was at a rally at the circus tavern in purfleet for grassroots out - a campaign group for britain to leave the eu .
there were cheers for mr farage as he described staying in the union as the `` dangerous choice '' .
meanwhile , britain stronger in europe argues that the uk is safer being part of the eu .
author: Simon Dedman
BBC Essex

documents.title: boy , 15 , bailed in harlow murder probe
text: a 15-year-old boy arrested on sus of murdering a man in harlow has been released on police bail .
hassan abdi mohamed ( 48 , was found collapsed on a path close to holly field on 5 march .
he later died of his injuries .
a teenager was detained on tuesday in london and has been bailed until may .
an 18-year-old man has previously been arrested and bailed in connection with the investigation .

documents.title: welcome to thursday 's essex live page
text: good morning .
join us until 18:00 to get the latest news , sport , travel and weather for the county as it happens .
it 's a nice bright start here in essex - a full weather forecast is coming shortly .
if you 'd like to say hello or send us any stories or can email us , tweet us , or visit our facebook page .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
